title: Github Champion
description: This is the Github Champion actor's input schema

githubApiToken.title: Github API token
githubApiToken.description: To use this actor with private repositories, you will need a GitHub API token with the **repo** permission granted  - create it at https://github.com/settings/tokens/new

repositoryOwner.title: Repository owner
repositoryOwner.description: The owner's or organization's name. E.g. "apify"

accountType.title: Type of account
accountType.description: Organization or user. For users, only public repositories an be listed.

repositories.title: Repositories
repositories.description: A JSON array of repository names. E.g. ["apify-docs", "apify-web"]. If left blank, the actor will include all of the owner's repositories.

numberOfWeeks.title: Number of weeks
numberOfWeeks.description: The number of weeks, from the day of the actor's run, to monitor. E.g. If you would like to monitor the activity from the past 4 weeks, enter 4. Defaults to 2.
